com.application.components

Class Broadcaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.application.components.Broadcaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Broadcaster
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class to share the changes through the whole server and different clients
    Author:
    Miguel Urízar Salinas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • registerEditionView

        public static FileRegistration registerEditionView(java.lang.String env,
                                   java.lang.String project,
                                   java.lang.String file,
                                   Broadcaster.BroadcastListener listener)
        Registers the UI as in the edition view to update it when necessary
        Parameters:
        env - Name of the environment
        project - Name of the project
        file - Name of the file
        listener - Listener of the UI.
        Returns:
        Link to the fileRegistration linked to the file.

      • unregisterEditionView

        public static void unregisterEditionView(java.lang.String projectFile,
                         Broadcaster.BroadcastListener listener)
        Unregisters the UI that goes out of the edition view.
        Parameters:
        projectFile - Name of the UI identifier to unregister.
        listener - Listener to unregister.

      • changeProject

        public static void changeProject(java.lang.String envId,
                 java.lang.String message)
        When changed project, update all the UIs that are in the file selection view
        Parameters:
        message - Message to send to the UIs

      • changeFile

        public static void changeFile(java.lang.String message,
              java.lang.String envId,
              java.lang.String projectId)
        When changed a file, update all the UIs that are in the same project as the file in selection view
        Parameters:
        message - Message to send to the UIs
        envId - Id of the environment to update only views with this active project
        projectId - Id of the project with this file active

      • kickUIsOfFile

        public static void kickUIsOfFile(java.lang.String envId,
                 java.lang.String projectId,
                 java.lang.String fileId,
                 java.lang.String message)
        Kick all UIs that are using an specific file.
        Parameters:
        envId - Name of the environment.
        projectId - Name of the project.
        fileId - Name of the file.
        message - Message to show the reason of kicking all UIs using this file.
